      • addToPanel

        public void addToPanel(javax.swing.JPanel panel)
        adds the VisualisationViewer to the given panel
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel represents the graph drawing panel

      • onResizePanel

        public void onResizePanel(javax.swing.JPanel panel)
        called if the panel (the frame) is resized
        Parameters:
        panel - the given panel that shows the graph

      • modifyLocationsIfOutOfBounds

        public void modifyLocationsIfOutOfBounds()
        is called when resizing the frame checks for all vertices if their position will be gone out of view. if so, the position will be modified to avoid disappearing of some vertices. This will ensure, that the complete graph is visible all the time.

      • getGraphRect

        public java.awt.Rectangle getGraphRect()
        calculates the rectangle of the drawed graph
        Returns:
        the rectangle of the graph or null, if no vertex is present

      • setMode

        public void setMode(int mode)
